    Function reference

    All functions

    STList-class
    Definition of an STList object class.
    STList()
    STList: Creation of STList objects
    STclust()
    STclust: Detect clusters on ST arrays
    bulk_pca()
    bulk_pca: Performs PCA on "bulk" spatial array
    cluster_purity()
    cluster_purity
    color_parse()
    color_parse: Creates a color palette
    count_cores()
    Get the number of cores to use in parallel as a function of the number of data to process. It will not yield a higher number of cores than half of the total available cores. Will default to 1 core if not Unix
    create_listw()
    create_listw
    deconv_krige()
    deconv_krige: Spatial interpolation of gene expression deconvolution scores
    detect_input()
    detect_input: Determine what is being provided to STList
    dim(<STList>)
    dim: Prints the dimensions of count arrays within an STList object.
    filter_data()
    filter_data: Removes spots, genes, or samples
    gene_geary_C()
    gene_geary_C
    gene_getis_Gi()
    gene_getis_Gi
    gene_krige()
    gene_krige: Spatial interpolation of gene expression
    gene_moran_I()
    gene_moran_I
    get_gene_stats()
    get_gene_stats
    krige_p()
    krige_p
    krige_p_purity()
    krige_p_purity
    krige_p_pvals()
    krige_p_pvals
    load_images()
    load_images: Place tissue images within STList
    log_transf()
    log_transf: Log-transformation of spatial arrays
    plot_QC_quilt()
    plot_QC_quilt: Plot UMI counts at each spot from an spatial array
    plot_QC_stats()
    plot_QCstats: Plots distribution of counts, gene number, or percents per sample
    plot_STclusters()
    plot_STclusters: Plot cluster memberships of ST spots
    plot_deconv_krige()
    plot_deconv_krige: Visualize spatial interpolation of deconvolution scores
    plot_deconv_quilt()
    plot_deconv_quilt: Deconvolution scores at each spot
    plot_gene_krige()
    plot_gene_krige: Visualize transcriptomic surfaces
    plot_gene_quilt()
    plot_gene_quilt: Gene expression at each spot from an spatial array
    quilt_p()
    quilt_p
    quilt_p_purity()
    quilt_p_purity
    quilt_p_purity_bw()
    quilt_p_purity_bw
    show(<STList>)
    show: Prints overview of STList oject.
    spatialDeconv()
    spatialDeconv: Deconvolution of ST data
    spatialTransform()
    spatialTransform: Data transformation of spatial transcriptomics data
    spatial_purity()
    spatial_purity
    spatial_stat_plot()
    spatial_stat_plot: Plots association of samples variable and spatial statistics
    spatial_stat_plot_gene()
    spatial_stat_plot_gene
    spatial_xcell()
    spatial_xcell
    summary(<STList>)
    summary: Prints overview of STList oject.
    voom_norm()
    voom_norm: voom transformation of ST arrays
    xcell_names()
    xcell_names: Prints xCell cell type names
